Name: Snap
Desc: Its flash only shines for true superstars.

1.Name: Snap! Look at the Camera!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Wipes the lens, obtaining 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Film</color>. While Snap has <color=#FFFFFF>Film</color>, when an Agent triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, Snap will consume 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Film</color> to take a snapshot and apply the <color=#FFFFFF>Superstar</color> status to the Agent, increasing their DMG for 10s.

1.Name: Superstar Moment
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
Triggered when there are 2 or more <color=#FFFFFF>Stars of Lyra</color> characters in the squad: When Snap applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Superstar</color> status to an Agent, immediately restore the Agent's Health equal to 4% of its Max HP.

2.Name: Superstar Moment
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
Triggered when there are 2 or more <color=#FFFFFF>Stars of Lyra</color> characters in the squad: When Snap applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Superstar</color> status to an Agent, immediately restore the Agent's Health equal to 5% of its Max HP.

1.Name: Snap! Don't Blink!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Use a powerful flash against the target, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#FE437E>Ether Anomaly Buildup</color>.
